CI_RESULT CI_Simple_RestoreLocal ( CI_VOID *  pHandle,
TCHAR *  szSession 
) [inline]

Restore last file state

Parameters:
pHandleis the Manager instance created by CI_Simple_CreateManager().
szSessionis the session name, which can be NULL.
Returns:
CI_SOK on success.
CI_EFAIL on failure.
CI_EPOINTER if pHandle is NULL.

CI_RESULT CI_Simple_StoreLocal ( CI_VOID *  pHandle,
TCHAR *  szSession,
TCHAR *  szFilePath 
) [inline]

Store current playback state, can be active by calling CI_Simple_RestoreLocal

Parameters:
pHandleis the Manager instance created by CI_Simple_CreateManager().
szSessionis the session name, which can be NULL.
szFilePathis media file
Returns:
CI_SOK on success.
CI_EFAIL on failure.
CI_EPOINTER if pHandle or szFilePath is NULL.
